page.title: 10MOTEL AND DEER PARK HOTEL
page.content: {HONITON GARAGE AND MOTEL At the west end of Honiton,100 yards from the bypass. Average number of customers 263 per day- 60% regular, 40% passing trade. MOTEL-Bar/Restaurant facilities, 6 bedrooms- bed & breakfast double room Â£25 per night.Dance hall accomodates 300 people. GARAGE- petrol & car accessories, 24 hour breakdown service,car wash, M.O.T. tests- 75 per week. {DEER PARK HOTEL 150 year old Georgian building set in 32 acres land-originally forrested area with deer. 3 star hotel with 61 bedrooms, a squash court, and a swimming pool. It is open all the year round and is used extensively for conferences. Bed & breakfast double room Â£43/Â£60 per night.
